categories: Category:Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic (comics)

nodes.text: Knights of the Old Republic 35: Vindication, Part 4 is the thirty-fifth issue in the Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic series of comics, and the fourth issue in the Vindication story arc.

At long last, Knights of the Old Republic will conclude Zayne's long journey as a fugitive Jedi Padawan  - but not before an astounding climax that will set a brand-new path for him to follow! Zayne and his former Master, Lucien Draay, will be tempted by the dark side while the Jedi Knights war among themselves and the city-planet Coruscant burns around them.

Although depicted on the cover, Marn Hierogryph never actually draws arms against Lucien Draay. John Jackson Miller said that this is due to the covers being drawn based on a synopsis of the issue—not specifc panels in the issue—where Draay was known to charge after Hierogryph.
